definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: Electrophoretic coating process on the aluminium alloy support used for solar energy heat unit is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了太阳能热水器铝合金托架的电泳涂漆工艺。

sentences.english: Phosphated bodies should be uniformly wet or dry when they enter the phosphate bath.
sentences.chinese: 磷化过的车身必须全湿或全干状态进入电泳槽。

sentences.english: The main factors influencing precipitation of electrophoretic coatings and their solving methods are given in this article.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了影响电泳漆沉淀的主要因素和采取的对策。

sentences.english: Electrophosresis in discontinuous buffer system was applied for the presenting patterns and fractions of the pancreatic amylase isoenzymes.
sentences.chinese: 应用不连续缓冲系统薄膜电泳法行酶谱分析。

sentences.english: Results There was a significant difference between the electrophoretograms of semen vaccariae and its adulterants.
sentences.chinese: 结果王不留行及伪品的电泳图谱存在显著差异。

sentences.english: It requires substantially less electrical consumption for deposition and, as a result, less refrigeration for cooling.
sentences.chinese: 电泳本身耗电量少，从而用于冷却的冷量也少。

sentences.english: Conclusion Polyacrylamide gel electrophoresis technology can be used for seed identification of Andrographis paniculata seeds.
sentences.chinese: 结论聚丙烯酰胺凝胶电泳手艺可用于穿心莲种子剖断。

sentences.english: Gradient gel electrophoresis determine small, dense low-density lipoprotein in plasma of patients with coronary heart disease.
sentences.chinese: 梯度胶电泳法测定冠心病患者血浆小密低密度脂蛋白。

sentences.english: After transformation, no shrinkage was found in electrophoretic paint film, and the liquidity was remarkably improved.
sentences.chinese: 转换后，电泳漆膜基本没有缩孔，流平性大大改善。

sentences.english: It is revealed that in double diffusion and immunoelectrophoresis the product yielded a single precipitating line.
sentences.chinese: 以双扩及免疫电泳鉴定，均呈现单一沉淀线。

sentences.english: Objective To study different thick agarose gel how to impact the DNA electrophoresis.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究不同厚度的琼脂糖凝胶对电泳的影响。

sentences.english: As media of electrophoresis, optimum concentration of agarose was 2%.
sentences.chinese: 用于电泳介质的琼脂糖最佳浓度为2%。

sentences.english: The polypeptide patterns of the eggs of Anopheles sinensis and An. anthropophagus were compared with two-dimensional electrophoresis in polyacrylamide gel.
sentences.chinese: 用二维电泳法比较分析两种按蚊卵的蛋白质多肽图谱。

sentences.english: Fibroin obtained from degummed raw silk was studied by sodium dodecyl sulphate polyacrylamide gel electrophoresis.
sentences.chinese: 用聚丙烯酰胺凝胶电泳研究了从生丝脱胶获得的丝素。

sentences.english: The immune effect was detected by counter immunoelectrophoresis.
sentences.chinese: 用对流免疫电泳试验检测免疫效果。

sentences.english: Granulosa cell apoptosis was detected by agarose gel electrophoresis.
sentences.chinese: 用琼脂糖凝胶电泳检测两类卵的颗粒细胞凋亡。

definition: vulcanization (curing rubber using sulfur and heat)
the coating of sth that has been chrome-plated or copper-plated etc
